strings:
<voice_0x01000B9A><se_low>*: ...Hm, hmm...?
What sinister presence lingers in the air!

<voice_0x01000B9B><se_low>*: And who are you?
Did you want to speak with me?

<voice_0x01000B9C><se_def>*: There they are!
*: It's them!
<voice_0x01000B9D><se_def>*: You'll be damned for trying to take Abbot Francisco's life!

<voice_0x01000B9E><se_low>Abbot Francisco: What on earth...!?
What's going on?

<voice_0x01000B9F><se_def>Marcello: Abbot Francisco.
Captain Marcello, at your service as always!

<voice_0x01000BA0><se_low>Abbot Francisco: Ah, Marcello!
Tell me what's happening.

<voice_0x01000BA1><se_def>Marcello: There has been a breach of security.
Many of the guards have been seriously wounded.
<voice_0x01000BA2><se_low>Abbot Francisco: What!?

<voice_0x01000BA3><se_def>Marcello: I feared you might be in danger,
so I came immediately...

<voice_0x01000BA4><se_def>Marcello: And sure enough, we've caught these criminals.
They've been loitering around the abbey since midday.

<voice_0x01000BA5><se_def>Marcello: It seems we were just in time.
I thank the Goddess that you're safe.

<voice_0x01000BA6><se_low>Abbot Francisco: ...Wait!
These people are no criminals.

<voice_0x01000BA7><se_def>Marcello: Please, Holy Father!
They were caught red-handed!

<voice_0x01000BA8><se_low>Abbot Francisco: Look into their eyes.
See their pure hearts.
These people are guilty of nothing.
<voice_0x01000BA9><se_def>Marcello: But...!
<voice_0x01000BAA><se_def>Marcello: Very good! But we must find out what they were doing here in your residence so late at night.
<voice_0x01000BAB><se_def>Marcello: At the very least, let us ascertain that. Please.

<voice_0x01000BAC><se_low>Abbot Francisco: Ho ho ho!
You really are a worrier, Marcello!
Very well, if you must!
<voice_0x01000BAD><se_def>Marcello: Thank you, Holy Father.
<voice_0x01000BAE><se_def>Marcello: ...So, shall we go?
